[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-text-canvas](./harp-text-canvas.md) &gt; [FontCatalog](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.md) &gt; [loadCharset](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.loadcharset.md)

## FontCatalog.loadCharset() method

Loads all the required glyphs needed to render the input text. Character repetition will not be considered, and only styled assets (with applied font selection, style and variants) will be loaded.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loadCharset(input: string, style: TextRenderStyle): Promise<GlyphData[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | string | Input text. |
|  style | [TextRenderStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textrenderstyle.md) | Specific \[\[TextRenderStyle\]\] for which glyphs will be loaded. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[GlyphData](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

Promise containing an array of all loaded \[\[GlyphData\]\] for the input text.
